thread.title: Anna
thread.title_full: River City Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by Anna

author: Anna
title: Anna
text: Moving to Red Wing from out of town, River City Carpet made choosing a carpet easy. Making an appointment and getting an estimate was convenient, and they worked with our schedule. The staff was very knowledgeable when choosing a carpet in their store. They had wonderful suggestions to help narrow down the best carpet for our family and still allowing us to stay within our price range. Thanks for all your help River City Carpet!
